trans-unit.source: Specifies the data source and data member properties for a component that supports complex data binding.
This class cannot be inherited.
The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute is used to specify the properties used with complex data binding, such as binding based on <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.
The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute attribute is specified at the class level.
It is inheritable and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
A control can support both simple binding, with <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>, as well as complex binding.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using no parameters.

The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties to `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source.

This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `null`.
The name of the property to be used as the data source.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source and data member.

This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `dataMember`.
The name of the property to be used as the data source.
The name of the property to be used as the source for data.
Gets the name of the data member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The DataMember property is set in the constructors for this class.
The name of the data member property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound
Gets the name of the data source property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The DataSource property is set in the constructors for this class.
The name of the data source property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
Represents the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.
The Default member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.
To be added.
Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance.

The Equals method returns `true` if `obj` is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.
The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating they are not equal.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
